instruction: Select four lines from a poem of your choice and change their order to create a new poem.
input:
Line 1: "Ah, love, let us be true to one another!" 
Line 2: "Love is not love which alters when it alteration finds"
Line 3: "Or bends with the remover to remove" 
Line 4: "O no, it is an ever-fixed mark"
output:
O no, it is an ever-fixed mark,
Ah, love, let us be true to one another!
Love is not love which alters when it alteration finds,
Or bends with the remover to remove.
